summary: Theme/UI enhancement pass: enable dark mode and improve visual design (bold colors, heading styles, appealing layout).

existing_features.title: Add an in-app dark mode capability that users can toggle at runtime, and ensure the entire UI correctly switches between light and dark themes using class-based dark mode.

Update the global color palette tokens for both light and dark modes to use a more vivid, bold, and high-contrast scheme (while keeping text readable and accessible) and apply it consistently across the app.
Improve typography hierarchy by making page titles and section headings more prominent (bold, consistent sizing, spacing, and tracking) and ensure a cohesive layout rhythm across the main pages.

Apply one coherent visual theme direction across the app (colors, typography, surfaces, and interactive states) that looks modern and “bold” while remaining professional for a CRM/fitness-coaching context.
